channel.title: Pretender ReDesign
channel.description:
# *"Down with this hideous castle! Gahh.. I'll just do it myself!"*
> # The Pretender [Neutral Special] > ## Passives > **False Authority** - Votes to become king will be multiplied by how many Blue Dragon you have Killed + 1. (None = x1. 1 = x2, 2 = x3, etc) > **Resolve** - Death immune to Non-BD once. > ## Day Abilities > None! > ## Night Abilities > **Legitimate Heir** - Determine a player's class type, and if they have *Royal Blood.* If they do, discover if they are [color=lighblue]Blue Dragon[/color]. If they have both, or are the **King**, you will attack them. (3 uses, consume a use upon killing somone) > **Allies Unknown** - Determine if a Player is not aligned with the [color=lighblue]Blue Dragon[/color].(2 uses) > ## Goal: Become the Spiteful King. # *"I have filled their empty power vacuum.. I will take them down from the inside out."*
> # The Spiteful King [Neutral Special] > ## Passives > **Evil Tenacity** - Occupy and Redirect Immune. > ## Day Abilities > **The Royal Finger** - Your next vote for treason will count as two. (Inf use) > **Decide Fate** - Decide the accused player's fate. (1 use) > ## Night Ability > **Suspicious Safeguard** - Send a Guard to target player, or yourself. If target player is [color=lighblue]Blue Dragon[/color], any attacks or conversion will succeed. Otherwise, target player gains *Death Immunity* tonight. (3 uses) > ## Goal: Defeat the [color=lighblue]Blue Dragon[/color]. (This will also be the king the Sellsword will turn into)

item.title: Pretender ReDesign
item.dc:creator: Napoleon
item.description:
I would actually consider the concept of this Pretender, being an anti-town King. Would have a lower win rate than Sellsword, which I think also needs a rework.

Read full topic

item.description:
Your Pretender is awfully similar to my version
Also it’s bad balance wise.

Read full topic

item.title: Pretender ReDesign
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Suspicious Safeguard - Send a Guard to target player, or yourself. If target player is Blue Dragon, any attacks will succeed. Otherwise, target player gains Death Immunity tonight. (3 uses)

Read full topic

item.title: Pretender ReDesign
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
JakeTheWolfie:

Suspicious Safeguard - Send a Guard to target player, or yourself. If target player is Blue Dragon, they will attack. Otherwise, target player gains Death Immunity tonight. (3 uses)

I would replace this with improved safeguard. It doesn’t need the Kill potential.

Read full topic

item.description:
What would you suggest then? (Spiteful king is also the king of the Sellsword, an objectively Evil sided class)

Read full topic

item.title: Pretender ReDesign

item.description:
JakeTheWolfie:

Legitimate Heir - Determine a player’s class type, and if they have Royal Blood. If they do, discover if they are Blue Dragon. If they have both, or are the King, you will attack them. (Inf use)

turns into

Legitimate Heir - Determine a player’s class type, and if they have Royal Blood. If they do, discover if they are Blue Dragon. If they have both, or are the King , you will attack them. (3 uses, gain a use if you did not attack)

JakeTheWolfie:

Allies Unknown - Determine if a Player is not aligned with the Blue Dragon. If they are, attack them. (2 uses)

turns into

Allies Unknown - Determine if a Player is not aligned with the Blue Dragon. (2 uses)

item.title: Pretender ReDesign
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
“Down with this hideous castle! Gahh… I’ll just do it myself!”

The Pretender [Neutral Special]

Passives

False Authority - Votes to become king will be multiplied by how many Blue Dragon you have Killed + 1. (None = x1. 1 = x2, 2 = x3, etc)
Resolve - Death immune to Non-BD once.

Day Abilities

None!

Night Abilities

Legitimate Heir - Determine a player’s class type, and if they have Royal Blood. If they do, discover if they are Blue Dragon. If they have both, or are the King, you will attack them. (3 uses, consume a use upon killing somone)
Allies Unknown - Determine if a Player is not aligned with the Blue Dragon.(2 uses)

Goal: Become the Spiteful King.

“I have filled their empty power vacuum… I will take them down from the inside out.”

The Spiteful King [Neutral Special]

Passives

Evil Tenacity - Occupy and Redirect Immune.

Day Abilities

The Royal Finger - Your next vote for treason will count as two. (Inf use)
Decide Fate - Decide the accused player’s fate. (1 use)

Night Ability

Suspicious Safeguard - Send a Guard to target player, or yourself. If target player is Blue Dragon, any attacks or conversion will succeed. Otherwise, target player gains Death Immunity tonight. (3 uses)

Goal: Defeat the Blue Dragon.

(This will also be the king the Sellsword will turn into)

Read full topic
